note.string: Place a {C/Healer} on the leftmost position to prevent the boss from gaining {B/BT_DAMGE_TAKEN}. {E/Earth} and {E/Water} DPS deal increased damage.

note_jp.string: ボスの{B/BT_DAMGE_TAKEN}を防ぐため、{C/Healer}を最左に配置。{E/Earth}と{E/Water} DPSがダメージ増加。

note_kr.string: 보스의 {B/BT_DAMGE_TAKEN}를 방지하려면 {C/Healer}를 가장 왼쪽에 배치. {E/Earth}와 {E/Water} DPS가 피해 증가.

note_zh.string: 将{C/Healer}放在最左侧以防止首领获得{B/BT_DAMGE_TAKEN}。{E/Earth}和{E/Water} DPS造成更多伤害。
